knownFailureFix.$comment: Display known failures in UI between ingredients with all effects known.

mixtureNames.$comment: Modify names to reflect additional effects/impurities.

impureCostFix.$comment: Impurities in mixtures subtract from the cost instead of adding to it.

copyExemplars.$comment: Swap models and names of crafted potions to the nearest exemplar.

roundedPotency.$comment: Round effect potency to a multiple above a threshold.

overrides.$comment: Define setting overrides per alchemy effect.
